comment._content:
Appears to be part of the contingent sent to Mexico, see adjoining photo USS 
Fate: Sunk by Japanese aircraft during attack on Pearl Harbor Hawaii, December 7, 1941.

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content:
Appears to be part of the contingent sent to Mexico, see adjoining photo USS Louisiana
ultimate fate: Sunk by Japanese aircraft during attack on Pearl Harbor Hawaii, December 7, 1941 and is today a memorial
